    • Scatterplot Comparison of Two Surveys Columns
    • Linear Model Comparison of Two Specified Surveys Columns

    Takes in the surveys dataset, cleans the data, and then creates a scatterplot comparing two specified columns in the dataset.

    survey_dotplot.Rd

    The function survey_dotplot first takes in the filepath to the surveys dataset and ensures it is clean using the survey_cleaner function and saving the output to a variable dataframe. Next, a custom ggplot function is created to make a scatterplot comparing the values of x_var and y_var. The titles for each axis are user-specified as the parameters x_title and y_title. Lastly, the function returns the variable containing the saved dotplot survey_plot to be used outside of the bounds of the current function as well as check for proper graphing.

    survey_dotplot(filepath, x_var, y_var, x_title, y_title)

    Arguments

    filepath

    The path to the csv file you want to process

    x_var

    the independent varaible infuencing the y-axis variable

    y_var

    the dependent variable varying in response to the x-axis variable

    x_title

    User-specified title for x-axis of plot

    y_title

    User-specified title for y-axis of plot

    Value

    survey_plot the scatterplot using the surveys dataset comparing two variables x_var and y_var

    Contents
